duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the Store Manager in staffing, setup, merchandising, pack-up, and teardown of a Seasonal Store.
Responsible for supporting the Store Manager in the tasks involved in the overall operation of a store, ensuring maximum sales/profitability.
Develop and maintain Guest Services, develop staff, control expenses, shrinkage, and all aspects of merchandising and inventory control.
Must have a flexible schedule and meet the physical demands of the job, including 8+ hours of standing and walking, climbing ladders, setting up fixtures, and lifting/moving up to 50 pounds.
Prior retail management experience is required.
